mapper.insert: insert into user_session (id, owner_id, target_id, session_id, nickname, create_time, update_time, unread_num, status, is_muted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{unreadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMuted,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update user_session set owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unread_num = #{unreadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_muted = #{isMuted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, owner_id, target_id, session_id, nickname, create_time, update_time, unread_num, status, is_muted from user_session where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, owner_id, target_id, session_id, nickname, create_time, update_time, unread_num, status, is_muted from user_session
